byline.contributor: Emily Palmer and Tatiana Schlossberg contributed reporting.
byline.original: By BENJAMIN MUELLER and ANDREW KEH

abstract: New York Knicks forward Cleanthony Early is shot in knee while riding in Uber car returning home from Queens strip club; police say he was targeted by group of half-dozen people bent on robbery.
lead_paragraph: A group of men converged on his cab after he left a strip club, the police said. They stole his cash, gold caps on his teeth, an iPhone and metal chains and shot him in the knee.

headline.main: Cleanthony Early of the Knicks Is Robbed and Shot in the Knee After Leaving a Queens Strip Club
headline.print_headline: Knicks Forward Is Robbed and Shot in the Knee After Leaving a Queens Strip Club

snippet: A group of men converged on his cab after he left a strip club, the police said. They stole his cash, gold caps on his teeth, an iPhone and metal chains and shot him in the knee.
